main.description: Record declaring the inclusion of a single material or a set of materials in a specific collection.

subjects.description: The material or set of materials to be included in the collection.

tags.description: User-specified tags for the collection item.

labels.description: General-purpose self-label values primarily for consumption by generic AT clients. See the `labels` property of `org.okazu-diary.feed.entry` for details.

via.description: Reference to an `org.okazu-diary.feed.entry` record or an `org.okazu-diary.feed.collectionItem` of another collection whose `subjects` this collection item is derived from.
